block.p: SPATZ-Natalie. Devoted wife of the late Irving. Adored, cherished and beloved mother of Allen, Kenneth and Diane. Devoted daughter to the late Jacob and Fannie Harmatz. Dear sister of Harold Harmatz, Lillian Gottesman, Judith Gethers, the late Belle Lefft and the late Theodore Harmatz. Loving friend of Ronnie Teres. Special aunt and great-aunt. Services Sunday, June 11, 12 noon at Gramarcy Park Memorial Chapel, 152 2nd Avenue, New York, N.Y.
